LIBRARY ieee;
USE ieee.std_logic_1164.all;
USE ieee.std_logic_arith.all;

ENTITY bonus_t1_shield_initial_reset IS
   PORT(
      clk   : IN     std_logic;
      rst_n : IN     std_logic;
      done  : OUT    std_logic;
      s_rst : OUT    std_logic
   );

-- Declarations

END bonus_t1_shield_initial_reset ;

--
-- VHDL Architecture alien_game_lib.bonus_t1_shield_initial_reset.fsm
--
-- Created:
--          by - viuhom.viuhom (linux-desktop9.tuni.fi)
--          at - 12:06:25 11/27/20
--
-- Generated by Mentor Graphics' HDL Designer(TM) 2019.3 (Build 4)
--
LIBRARY ieee;
USE ieee.std_logic_1164.all;
USE ieee.std_logic_arith.all;

ARCHITECTURE fsm OF bonus_t1_shield_initial_reset IS

   TYPE STATE_TYPE IS (
      initial,
      reset,
      final,
      s0
   );

   -- Declare current and next state signals
   SIGNAL current_state : STATE_TYPE;
   SIGNAL next_state : STATE_TYPE;

   -- Declare Wait State internal signals
   SIGNAL csm_timer : std_logic_vector(3 DOWNTO 0);
   SIGNAL csm_next_timer : std_logic_vector(3 DOWNTO 0);
   SIGNAL csm_timeout : std_logic;
   SIGNAL csm_to_reset : std_logic;

BEGIN

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   clocked_proc : PROCESS (
      clk,
      rst_n
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   BEGIN
      IF (rst_n = '0') THEN
         current_state <= initial;
         csm_timer <= (OTHERS => '0');
      ELSIF (clk'EVENT AND clk = '1') THEN
         current_state <= next_state;
         csm_timer <= csm_next_timer;
      END IF;
   END PROCESS clocked_proc;

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   nextstate_proc : PROCESS (
      csm_timeout,
      current_state,
      rst_n
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   BEGIN
      -- Default assignments to Wait State entry flags
      csm_to_reset <= '0';
      CASE current_state IS
         WHEN initial =>
            IF (rst_n = '1') THEN
               next_state <= reset;
               csm_to_reset <= '1';
            ELSE
               next_state <= initial;
            END IF;
         WHEN reset =>
            IF (csm_timeout = '1') THEN
               next_state <= s0;
            ELSE
               next_state <= reset;
            END IF;
         WHEN final =>
            next_state <= final;
         WHEN s0 =>
            next_state <= final;
         WHEN OTHERS =>
            next_state <= initial;
      END CASE;
   END PROCESS nextstate_proc;

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   output_proc : PROCESS (
      current_state
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   BEGIN
      -- Default Assignment
      done <= '0';
      s_rst <= '0';

      -- Combined Actions
      CASE current_state IS
         WHEN final =>
            s_rst <= '1';
            done <= '1';
         WHEN s0 =>
            s_rst <= '1';
         WHEN OTHERS =>
            NULL;
      END CASE;
   END PROCESS output_proc;

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   csm_wait_combo_proc: PROCESS (
      csm_timer,
      csm_to_reset
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   VARIABLE csm_temp_timeout : std_logic;
   BEGIN
      IF (unsigned(csm_timer) = 0) THEN
         csm_temp_timeout := '1';
      ELSE
         csm_temp_timeout := '0';
      END IF;

      IF (csm_to_reset = '1') THEN
         csm_next_timer <= "1001"; -- no cycles(10)-1=9
      ELSE
         IF (csm_temp_timeout = '1') THEN
            csm_next_timer <= (OTHERS=>'0');
         ELSE
            csm_next_timer <= unsigned(csm_timer) - '1';
         END IF;
      END IF;
      csm_timeout <= csm_temp_timeout;
   END PROCESS csm_wait_combo_proc;

END fsm;
